column5: Well it`s been a long wait for this Richter lake trip but the time has finally come,the bags are packed fresh line on the reels can`t wait it is my son and I first time on a fly-in and I know it`s going to be a blast. Going with Rob (kickingfrog) and his brother,Ben Beattie and his buddy Joe and my son Brad.  See you guys sometime Friday afternoon, have a safe drive!!!
sounds like it's going to be a great trip
Have a great trip Gord, wish I was joining you.
Have fun Gord,its Gods country up there.  Take a moment or two after dark to star gaze,they are simply amazing to see that far north  look forward to your report upon your return
Wish I had the big bux. Oh well,I lived my dream.  Have a great time.
Have fun Gord!! Ben and the boys.. oh and that Rob guy.. .should be a great time!
Have a super trip. Lotsa pics for us shut-ins please.
Dont forget the Lithium batteries too Enjoy guys  !!!
I am sure it will be the trip you will compare all your future trips to.  Have a good time!!
Good trip lads.  Have a blasty ole blast with the marbly eyeballs.
Have a wicked trip bud!  Hope you get to give those leaders a good workin.
Your going to love Nakina.....went there to Lake Aba years ago.  Eight men flew in with the aid of a otter for 7 days...  1080 walleyes came out of the lake with a additional 243 pike...
make sure you have lots of walleye batter !!! your going to need it....mmmmm walleyes....yummy take tons of pics...have a great time...cheers
Rice brothers on the road. Plan is to sleep in cochrane.
